entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
